eggWeakness.title: Fire sensitivity
eggWeakness.description: When Nemesis suffers from fire, Molotov cocktail or Flamethrower, it takes 1 additional damage

nemesisBodyWeakness.title: Energy sensitivity
nemesisBodyWeakness.description: Each energy weapon attack that deals 1 damage, deals 1 additional damage

crewMemberBodyWeakness.title: Mobility
crewMemberBodyWeakness.description: Apart from Queen and Breeders, no other Nemesis can destroy closed doors
